job.title: Estimator -- Civil Landscape & Irrigation Contractor
job.description: If you are an Estimator with experience, please read on!We are a civil contractor focusing on projects such as retaining walls, concrete, concrete parking lots for parks, TxDOT, and school projects looking to add an estimator to our team. Apply today!What You Will Be DoingGather and evaluate bids from subcontractorsActively seek new bid opportunitiesAccurate quantity takeoffs with OSTAttend bid and precon meetingsWork with project management to ensure projects are on budgetWhat You Need for this Position3+ years of estimating or PM experience with concrete, landscape, irrigation, or similarBid 2 win, OST, or similar software preferred but not requiredWhat's In It for YouCompetitive Salary 65-100K annually depending on experienceStrong Benefits PackageCompany vehicle and gas cardBonus PotentialSo, if you are an Estimator with experience, please apply today!Email Your Resume In Word ToLooking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you. Clicking apply is the best way to apply, but you may also:Rob.Zarrella@CyberCoders.comPlease do NOT change the email subject line in any way. You must keep the JobID: linkedin : RZ1-1647488 -- in the email subject line for your application to be considered.***Rob Zarrella - Executive Recruiter - CyberCodersApplicants must be authorized to work in the U.S.CyberCoders, Inc is proud to be an Equal Opportunity EmployerAll qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.Your Right to Work - In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire.
